title: $:/plugins/sq/webdav-utils
author: Saq Imtiaz
name: WebDAV Utilities for a wiki farm
readme:
@@color:red;''Experimental plugin - no support available. Use at your own risk.''@@

* Improved ~WebDAV saver that creates backups
** Recommend disabling ~AutoSave when backups are enabled
* ~FileUploads plugin support for ~WebDAV
** supports a path filter cascade to customize the upload path
** See settings for ~FileUploads to determine which tiddlers are uploaded
* A file explorer showing what files are present on the server $:/FileExplorer
** affordances to retrieve the list of contents of folders on the server via the widget message `tm-webdav-ls`
